name: Fed
description:
Fed is a visual successor to my first Unity project Feed the Beast. It's a straightforward 2D platform, jump from platform to platform avoiding dangerous tentacles, pitfalls, and eldritch abominations. Collect runes to add to your score. Reach the end of the level to win. 

Instructions

-A and D to move

-Space to Jump

-W and S to look up and down

-Jump on enemies heads to kill them 

-Make sure to play in full screen 

This is simply a short one-level game, my main focus when developing it was building a portfolio of sprite animations and learning the layout of unity. I completed the level in about 2 and a half months. Let me know if anyone is interested in seeing this game further developed, it has a long way to go but I have some ideas revolving around freezing time in order to solve puzzles. All in all, it's just a fun art piece I wanted to share, any feedback is more than welcome!
